title: The 2025 Cinelli Nemo Gravel Features a Hi-Ride Sterra fork
content:
Cinelli‘s Nemo gravel bike has undergone quite a facelift…

It now features a frame that is made in Italy of custom-drawn, triple-butted Columbus Spirit tubing, 47 mm tire clearance, increased stack, 55 mm of rake, and the Hi-Ride Sterra fork that offers 20 mm of hydraulic suspension. The Nemo comes in a variety of parts kits (GRX €5.200), including a frame and fork in both the Hi-Ride configuration (€3.200) and rigid configuration (€2.600), and comes in seven different color options. The Nemo covers just about every body size with XS through XXL sizing, too.

Specs:

  • Completely re-designed geometry
  • 700 x 47mm \ 650b x 50mm tire clearance
  • Designed specifically for Hi-Ride Sterra fork system: 20 mm of hydraulic travel
  • As of March 2023, all Nemo frames are manufactured within the Cinelli Milan HQ
  • Custom-shaped seat stays with oriented ellipses and lowered seat tube welding pointing to optimize long-distance comfort
  • Seat collar
  • Custom-drawn Columbus Spirit triple-butted tubes
  • Adaptive geometry on rigid fork option thanks to Columbus fork dropouts that allow to change the rake from 47 to 52 mm
  • Available in six different paint options plus one limited edition color of the year

See more at Cinelli.
